dsense.name: trade off [sth] for [sth], trade off [sth] against [sth]

example.eg: The new speakers look stylish, but I would not trade off the sound for the appearance.
example.egtrans: 这些新扬声器看起来很时髦，不过我是不会用声音品质来换取外观的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以某物换取某物, 牺牲...换取

example.eg: Counterfeiters trade off brand name reputations.
example.egtrans: 销售假冒伪劣商品的商家以品牌声誉换取钱财。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以某物换取某物, 牺牲...换取

example.eg: The tradeoff is that I will teach you Dutch in exchange for Russian lessons.
We proposed a tradeoff that both sides could agree to.
